DioDeck

Sophomore Year College

Worked on a WPI Startup as a product design engineer for the companies various products. The company was founded in 2017 and the purpose of the company is to create self - teaching content related to STEM Education.

The product I worked on was for the companies kit. The product along with all the kits components makes the company's product better according to the company's CEO

Diodeck has won various awards in WPI's Entrepreneurship network and you can check out the website made in HTML/CSS/Bootstrap and varios JavaScript frameworks such as Node.js, Rect.js, and Angular.js below:
